short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to search Salesforce Metadata

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used to open the metadata used in the salesforce org without going to the Salesforce setup.

Supported Metadata
> Apex Class
> Apex Trigger
> Visualforce Page
> Custom Label
> Profile 
> Permission Set
> Flow

In the new update user can select whether the metadata opens in classic or lightning view. User can also set the default metadata type. These can be configured using settings icon on the home page.
